item.title: Mob Scarecrows Mod
item.description: This mod adds many cute plushies and scarecrows into minecraft which can be used to scare away mobs or attract them. 1,000,000 + Downloads About The Mod The mod has many different scarecrows which look like plushies that are used to keep mobs away from your base. The scarecrows are entities that can be placed anywhere and different scarecrows scare different mobs. Some scarecrows attract mobs making them very useful for mob farms.
